Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo! I heard you're buildin' a Free Fall Machine, so
I came by to lend a hand.
<PAGE>
So what's a "free fall machine?" A ride that takes
folks way up and drops 'em? Huh. This must be
one'a them foreign blueprints.
<PAGE>
Well, it beats me why people would want to fall
on purpose, but at least I get how the machine
works now.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, let's get to work! I'll give you some
pointers as we go, so do like I tell you, 'kay?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, looks like it's all done. So, how do you
actually operate this thing?
<PAGE>
Anyway, I'll be headin' on home, then.

The Free Fall Machine is complete! I should put
it somewhere.
